statusDetails.message:
Appium HTTP server has started and is listening although we were unable to get an OK response from http://127.0.0.1:4723/wd/hub/status. Make sure both the client and the server use the same base path '/wd/hub/' and check the server log for possible error messages occurrences.

Response payload: {"status":9,"value":{"error":"unknown command","message":"The requested resource could not be found, or a request was received using an HTTP method that is not supported by the mapped resource","stacktrace":""}}
